## Bio

I am a recent graduate from Simmons University, holding a double major in Data Science and Analytics and Statistics, with a minor in Public Health. I am passionate about using data analysis and machine learning on global healthcare data to develop innovative solutions for real-world problems. My academic journey has equipped me with a robust set of data science skills, demonstrated through my various coursework and projects. I am particularly interested in using machine learning techniques to uncover insights and drive decision-making in healthcare.
